text: Peter Thomson, OF (born 1948 in Suva), is a Fijian diplomat. He was President of the General Assembly of the United Nations from 2016 to 2017. He has been Fiji's Permanent Representative to the United Nations since February 2010."LE NOUVEAU REPRÉSENTANT PERMANENT DE FIDJI AUPRÈS DES NATIONS UNIES PRÉSENTE SES LETTRES DE CRÉANCE", United Nations press release, 4 March 2010 ==References== ==Other websites== * "The Folly of Canberra's Stand against Fiji" , full text of Peter Thomson's speech to the Australia-Fiji Business Council Conference, 14 September 2009 (on the website of the Auckland University of Technology) Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of the United Nations General Assembly Category:Fijian people
title: Peter Thomson (diplomat)
